text: Canana Films is a Mexican film production company. ==Profile== Diego Luna and García Bernal created the company in 2005 and left the company in 2018, It recently joined Golden Phoenix Productions (owned by producer Tom Golden of Hot Springs, Arkansas) to jointly produce a number of television documentaries about the unsolved murders of around three hundred women in the border city of Ciudad Juárez. ==Films== * Miss Bala (2019) * Salt and Fire (2016) * Mr. Pig (2016) * Eva Doesn't Sleep (2015) * The Ardor (2014) * César Chávez (2014) * Carmita (2013) * No (2012) * Fronteras (2011) * Verdaderamente Durazo (2011) * ' (2010) * Los Invisibles (2010) * Post Mortem (2010) * Cefalópodo (2010) * Samantha (2010) * 18 cigarrillos y medio (2010) * Rudo y Cursi (2008) * Just Walking (2008) * El búfalo de la noche (2007) * Ruta 32 (2006) == References == ==External links== * Canana Films Webpage * Category:Companies based in Mexico City Category:Entertainment companies established in 2005 Category:Film production companies of Mexico Category:Mass media in Mexico City
title: Canana Films
